title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the beef with onions and garlic.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Fry the onions and garlic until soft.
Add chicken and curry powder, then cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.
